original_text: Now a man from the house of Levi went and took as his wife a Levite woman.
korean_text: 레위 가족 중 한 사람이 가서 레위 여자에게 장가 들어

sentences.original_text: Now a man from the house of Levi went
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 레위 족속의 한 사람이 나아가서

sentences.original_text: and took as his wife a Levite woman
